title.rendered: The Blastolene B-702 Will Blow You Away

content.rendered: The Peterson Automotive Museum in Los Angeles received this amazing classic roadster and someone made certain to get footage of its unboxing! Behold the Blastolene B-702! It’s got a GMC 702 cubic inch engine with an Allison 4 speed automatic transmission. This era of roadster was as much about style as it was about performance! It’s got a one-of-a-kind aluminum body with a sleek maroon leather interior!

category.description: The finer things in life sometimes come to us on four wheels. If you like your cars to have a silver spoon in their grills, these are the stories for you.

content.rendered:
We love seeing horrible people get put in their place. This kid is asking for it the second he shows up in this video. We’re not sure what country this is, but watch as this little punk cuts off the driver with the dash cam. The kid then gets out to harass the driver of the car he stopped. We assume he was trying to rob or maybe even car jack the man.

Now this is the best part! The kid has no idea that he’s messing with an off-duty police officer! As soon as his gun is drawn, the punk stops dead in his track and completely gives up!

content.rendered: Cats can be skittish little creatures. The slightest noise, bump or scare can send them flying. This Nissan owner was in his car, hiding from his cat, when he saw an opportunity for a good laugh. He waited for the the cat to walk across the hood before he lightly taps the horn. This sends the cat straight up in the air!

content.rendered: Chevy’s El Camino is that iconic half car/half truck that some younger drivers may not remember. Chevrolet ran production on the El Camino twice. The first run was in the 1959-60 model year but only lasted two years. The second run was much more successful and ran from 1964 to 1987. Now, Chevrolet has decided to bring it back, and it’s looking pretty sexy!

content.rendered: We’ve all been there before. You’re on the highway, cruising along, when all of the sudden you notice everyone slamming on their brakes in front of you. title.rendered: Bikers Help a Bullied Five-Year-Old Girl

content.rendered: These are the Punishers. They’re a bike club made of up retired law enforcement, paramedics, and nurses. Their love of bikes and their desire to help their community truly sets them apart from biker stereotypes. When they heard of a local 5 year-old girl was being bullied, they knew they had to act! They got together to visit the girl and give their support!

title.rendered: Marines Test Their Combat Paddle Boat Prototype

content.rendered: Few organizations get crazier with their original vehicle designs like the US Military! Here’s the Marine’s newest ride. It’s the Ultra Heavy-Lift Amphibious Connector (UHAC). This is going to be their eventual replacement for the LCAC Hovercraft. It’s essentially a ship-to-shore connection vehicle; however, this prototype came out under half the size of the intended final model!

title.rendered: Man Rages All Over His Mercedes S63 AMG

content.rendered: Someone on the street got footage of this man having a temper tantrum that involved HIS Mercedes S63 AMG and a golf club. Apparently, the man had recently bought the car and, after some reoccurring engine trouble, it failed him for a third time. He took it to the dealership where they told him nothing could be done until their manager came back from vacation the next week. That’s when the man had enough and remedied the problem his own way – with a lot of golf club!

content.rendered: This guy in a Nissan 350Z pulled up next to a Dodge Challenger at a light and thought he was about to smoke it from the line. The light turns and he takes off, pulling out ahead. That’s when the police lights come on in the undercover Challenger and the race comes to an abrupt end! You can actually hear the moment the man’s heart leaps into his throat! He claims once the cop caught him he asked if he still wanted to race but he should just be glad he got away without a ticket!

title.rendered: LaFerrari And Porsche GT3 Terrorize Beverly Hills

content.rendered:
These idiots take all the credit for being two of the most selfish and unsafe drivers on the planet and also for treating such beautiful cars with zero respect!

A number of people in Beverly Hills filmed these two jerks who paraded their wealth and entitlement around their block. They run stop signs and pass cars illegally. While it makes your blood boil to watch them behave so irresponsibly, it’ll hurt even more when you see the damage they do these cars. The poor LaFerrari suffers some serious scraping as well an an engine fire!

title.rendered: Mercedes G63 AMG 6×6 Takes on Supercars

content.rendered: Mercedes Benz is here to prove an off-road 6×6 can hold its own with supercars on a legitimate track! Meet the G63 AMG 6×6. It’s a twin turbocharged 5.5 liter V8 holding off road beast that produces an impressive 544 HP.

content.rendered: This guy has some serious self-control! He went out to his parked car to find a woman, who he’d never seen before, rifling through his belongings like it was perfectly acceptable. So what does he do? He gets it on film. He records her for almost a minute without her knowing. She finally turns around to see herself caught. She tries to explain it away but the owner isn’t having any of it!

title.rendered: Bloodhound Rocket Car Aims for 1,000 MPH Record

content.rendered:
This is the Bloodhound. It’s a supersonic, jet powered car designed to break the land speed record this year and then break 1,000 MPH barrier next year! It’s powered by a jet engine taken from a Euro Fighter Typhoon. Once he hits 300 MPH, three hybrid rockets will fire pushing the car past the sound barrier and beyond 1,000 MPH.

At these dangerous speeds, even the slightest piece of debris kicked up by the tires can tear through the car and cause catastrophic damage. To that end, the car is covered in panels made of millions of tightly woven glass threads. This makes the car practically bulletproof!

content.rendered: Roger Knobel has put together this incredible RC model SR-71 Blackbird. It’s a perfect replica of the real thing that flies via a powerful Behotec Turbine Engine. title.rendered: Woman Has Insane Reaction to Speeding Ticket

content.rendered:
A woman in Palm Beach County, Florida was pulled over for driving 51 MPH in a school zone! The cop approaches her car and politely explains what’s going to happen…she goes nuts. In most states, speeding 15 MPH over the limit gets you a super speeder ticket which mean the ticket cost goes up exponentially. Compound that with speeding in a school zone, and God only knows how costly that ticket will become.

So when the cop comes back to properly cite her for putting children’s lives in danger, what does she do? She says, plain as day, “No wonder you people get shot.”

We realize there are plenty of stories out there about officers that abuse their position and authority, but for every bad apple, there are countless good ones. We’d love to see this woman lose her license entirely!

excerpt.rendered:
A woman in Palm Beach County, Florida was pulled over for driving 51 MPH in a school zone! The cop approaches her car and politely explains what’s going to happen…she goes nuts. In most states, speeding 15 MPH over the limit gets you a super speeder ticket which mean the ticket cost goes up exponentially.

category.name: Good Guy Bad Guy
category.description: No matter the circumstances, if you like to watch people get into confrontations or get revenge, you'll find what you like here.

content.rendered:
This dash cam video shows an individual traveling on a South Carolina highway with a North Carolina cop playing pace car, preventing him from passing. Eventually, the driver manages to snake around the other lane and pass (on the right). Not long after, the deputy speeds up and gets back in front of our driver! The cop brake checks the car, causing a small collision!

The deputy has since resigned.

title.rendered: Car Owner Stops Thief in His Tracks

content.rendered:
We love seeing justice brought to the lawless. This video shows just that! The black Honda at the pump second from the right has two people in it. While one pumps gas the passenger decides to try and make off with the car parked in front of the gas station. He barely gets it moving when the owner comes out and jumps into the passenger seat to claim what’s his. After some wrestling he forces the perpetrator out as other patrons help subdue him while the police arrive.

The best part is when the thief’s friend sees him in trouble and just leaves him there!
